mapper.sql: vndr_no, dlvy_guide_bgn_code, dlvy_guide_info, rgster_no, rgst_dtm, moder_no, mod_dtm
mapper.update:
/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.vendor.repository.master.VdVendorDeliveryGuideDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE vd_vendor_delivery_guide
vndr_no = #{vndrNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dlvy_guide_bgn_code = #{dlvyGuideBgnCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dlvy_guide_info = #{dlvyGuideInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
moder_no = #{moderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mod_dtm = #{modDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE dlvy_guide_bgn_code = #{dlvyGuideBgnCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND vndr_no = #{vndrNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
